quotes.quote: Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coattails.
Chasing the external to achieve joy is a death trap for personal development.
People are chasing cash, not happiness. When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to. Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.
Living in a constant chase after gain compels people to expend their spirit to the point of exhaustion.
Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coat tails.
Chasing money to please society.
Chase your passion, not your pension.
You have to chase your dreams, no matter what. The impossible just takes a little longer. One stroke at a time, one step at a time, the impossible is easy to achieve.
Everyone chases a bit of what they say life is about: money, desire. But when you stop chasing, you realise life is a rhythm and it's very peaceful, very quiet. You see, it's quite a miracle.
Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coat-tails.
Never chase a lie. Let it alone, and it will run itself to death.
Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.
Keep God first, chase your dreams, and everything will pay off.
Pursue your goals with all your heart, might, mind and strength. You are doomed to failure if you pursue them in a vacillating manner.
Chasing a person doesn't give you value or build values in you. You earn your value by chasing morality and practicing dignity.
Chase down your passion like it's the last bus of the night.
Chase your dreams with all your strength, soul and spirit.
If you pursue happiness, you are an ordinary person. If happiness pursues you, you are an extraordinary person. Do not chase happiness; let it chase you.
Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
Chase excellence, success will follow.
To chase the glowing hours with flying feet.
It's really hard to chase a lofty dream.
Pursue great things. You are destiny for greatness.
Chase your dreams. Don't wait till the dreams come true.
